instructions.d1: Hello, and welcome to Rune Search! I am Goat.
instructions.d3: I love to eat letters! Use the arrow keys to help me find them. (I can't see very well...)
instructions.d4: If YOU need to go eat something, press 'p' to pause the game.
instructions.d5: Oh and also, watch out for any weirdos lurking around in the letters. You never really know what is out there...

door.d2: You can't just open a door without a key!!! You scared it away!

music.d1: Check out some traditional Goat music!
music.d2: Passed down the Goat family for generations, of course.
music.d3: All written by May Lawver.
